pages.text: Cryokinesis is an ability that gives gems that have it ice shard projectiles and when they get emotional, ice spikes that shoot from the ground dealing damage.
$(l)Gems that are guaranteed to have$()$(li)Sapphire$(li)Snowflake Obsidian$(li)Larimar$(br2) $(l)Gems that have a chance to have$()$(li)Quartzes
